I attended for the first time at Prime Minister Chiaki in the memorial ceremony of the victim of Minamata disease. While asking stories of the bereaved families and the victims, we have renewed our pledge that we should not repeat such tragedy, we will support the government as much as possible. The laws and policies for victim relief have been decided, but I believe that the future is the beginning.
